name: Skylark
description:
Skylark is a top down classic arcade shooter where you play as a character of the same name.

Skylark is stuck in a dream. Her senses have led her to believe she is a ex planetary scout turned dreamy adventurer; she finds herself stuck in a fight against doubt incarnate. Help her pilot through obstacles and doubt ridden skies to finally shoot to shoot down the heart of her dream and return her to consciousness.
